Sentencas: Effects of Mn content on the performance of Mn-Co spinel coatings are clarified systematically.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of Mn content in the Mn-Co spinel coating on its formation and slowing the outward Cr diffusion

Sentencas: Two dense spinel coatings are fabricated on Crofer 22 H by microwave sintering and subsequent oxidation.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of Mn content in the Mn-Co spinel coating on its formation and slowing the outward Cr diffusion

Sentencas: After oxidation at 800 degrees C in air for 400 h, the thickness of the Cr-containing layer of MnCo2O4-coated sample is significantly lower than that of (Mn, Co)3O4-coated sample.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of Mn content in the Mn-Co spinel coating on its formation and slowing the outward Cr diffusion

Sentencas: The growth mechanism of Cr-containing layer is elucidated from aspects of stabilizing energy and configurational entropy.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of Mn content in the Mn-Co spinel coating on its formation and slowing the outward Cr diffusion

Sentencas: Controlling Mn3+ content reduces the outward diffusion channels for Cr and avoids the excessive growth of the Cr-containing layer, achieving a lower resistance as well.
Titulo: Exploring the effects of Mn content in the Mn-Co spinel coating on its formation and slowing the outward Cr diffusion
